metadata.title: CVE-2018-21247 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in LibVNCServer before 0.9.13. There is aninformation leak (of uninitialized memory contents) in thelibvncclient/rfbproto.c ConnectToRFBRepeater function.

criterions.comment: libvncserver: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
x11vnc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
